item.title: Nustache (Mustache Templates for .NET)
item.dc:creator: Jason Diamond
item.description: I’ve been working on a small project that brings Mustache templates to .NET. It’s called Nustache. The code is on GitHub and there are packages on NuGet (for the core engine and an MVC 3 view engine). I was excited about using the Mustache syntax, but that was before I started using Razor. It’s still [...]
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been working on a small project that brings Mustache templates to .NET. It’s called Nustache. The code is on GitHub and there are packages on NuGet (for the core engine and an MVC 3 view engine).

I was excited about using the Mustache syntax, but that was before I started using Razor. It’s still been a fun project to work on and I wanted to point it out in case anybody else was interested.
